channel.title: Events on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Business Directory

item.title: All Nu Events and Party Rentals
item.description:
About Us

All Nu Events and Party Rentals specializes in providing high-quality rental equipment for events, including tents, chairs, tables, and portable toilets. Our commitment to exceptional service and diverse inventory ensures that your event is both memorable and hassle-free.

Our Services

  • Tent Rentals: Various sizes of quality tents for any occasion
  • Furniture Rentals: Wide selection of chairs and tables
  • Portable Toilets: Clean and well-maintained facilities
  • Event Equipment: Complete event setup solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Allan Mahabir
  • Phone: 290-3700 / 290-3701
  • Email: stormerallan@hotmail.com
  • Social Media: Follow us on Facebook

item.title: Donafes Food Services Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

Donafes Food Services Ltd. specializes in supplying delicious cakes and pastries, perfect for any occasion. We also offer catering services for small to medium events, ensuring a delightful culinary experience for your guests with our quality baked goods and professional service.

Our Services

  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully crafted cakes for special occasions
  • Fresh Pastries: Daily selection of quality pastries
  • Event Catering: Professional catering for small to medium events
  • Specialty Baking: Custom baked goods for special requests

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Shobha Chadeesingh
  • Phone: 764-3967
  • Email: donafes@gmail.com
  • Social Media: Visit us on Facebook

item.title: Clint Arjoon Group of Companies
item.description:
About Us

Clint Arjoon Group of Companies offers a diverse range of services including resort rentals, portable toilet rentals, equipment rentals, and septic cleaning. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, we provide reliable solutions for both leisure and commercial needs.

Our Services

  • Resort Rental: Comfortable and well-maintained resort accommodations
  • Portable Toilet Rental: Clean and reliable portable sanitation solutions
  • Equipment Rental: Wide range of equipment for various needs
  • Septic Cleaning: Professional septic system maintenance and cleaning

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Clint Arjoon
  • Phone: 351-5055 / 297-3181
  • Email: trintent@gmail.com
  • Website: clintarjoongroup.com

item.title: Arl's Kitchen and Kake Boutique
item.description:
About Us

Arl’s Kitchen and Kake Boutique specializes in custom cakes and catering services, offering a unique blend of creativity and flavor for all occasions. With a focus on quality ingredients and personalized designs, we ensure that every event is memorable and delicious.

Our Services

  • Custom Cakes: Beautifully designed custom cakes for weddings, birthdays, and special occasions
  • Catering Services: Professional catering for events of all sizes with personalized menu options

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Arlene Cilla Roberts
  • Phone: 304-1681
  • Email: arlskitchen199@gmail.com

item.title: Marine and Land Group of Companies
item.description:
About Us

Specializing in the construction of container offices, Marine and Land Group of Companies also offers tool and equipment rentals along with comprehensive civil and mechanical engineering services. Their commitment to quality and efficiency sets them apart in the industry.

Our Services

  • Container Office Construction: Custom construction of container-based office spaces
  • Tool & Equipment Rentals: Wide range of construction and engineering tools and equipment for rent
  • Civil Engineering Services: Comprehensive civil engineering solutions for various projects
  • Mechanical Engineering Services: Professional mechanical engineering design and implementation

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Chris Shamrule
  • Phone: 472-5000 / 764-6681
  • Email: marineandland@outlook.com
